Package jparsec.math

Tools to apply different common math operations in astrophysics.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CGSConstant
    A class to hold physical constants in C.G.S. units.
    Complex
    A support class for complex numbers.
    Constant
    Some useful physical constants, preferently in International System of Units.
    Converter
    A class to perform unit conversions.
    Derivation
    Performs numerical derivation.
    DoubleVector
    A vector specialized on doubles.
    Evaluation
    A class for evaluating functions into numbers.
    FastMath
    Provides methods for fast (approximate) calculation of trigonometric functions.
    GenericFit
    A class for fitting data to an arbitrary function of 3 independent variables.
    Integration
    Provides method to perform numerical integration.
    Interpolation
    Tools for linear and spline interpolation.
    LATEXFormula
    A class to create equations using JMathTex library.
    LinearFit
    A class for fitting data to a straight line in a very rigorous way.
    MeanValue
    Performs ponderation operation.
    Polynomial
    Represents a polynomial equation of the form p(x) = A + B*x + C*x^2 + D*x^3 + ...
    Regression
    A class for fitting data to a Gaussian function, a polynomial (Nelder and Mead Simplex method), or simple/multiple linear regression.
    Root
    A class to find roots using Newton-Raphson and midpoint methods.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LinearFit.MAX_CORRELATION
    The set of possible variable to modify during the search for maximum correlation.

Package jparsec.math Description

Tools to apply different common math operations in astrophysics.

Classes for derivation, integration, fitting, interpolation, and more.
